channel.title: CVE Feed for trasweb -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for trasweb -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-1661|2024-08-02T05:57:24.343Z -- trasweb -- display%20post%20meta%2C%20term%20meta%2C%20comment%20meta%2C%20and%20user%20meta
item.description: The Display post meta, term meta, comment meta, and user meta plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via post metadata in versions up to, and including, 0.4.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level permissions and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
